import numpy as np
from PIL import Image, ImageDraw, ImageFilter
import random
import math

def generate_flame_art(seed=None):
    if seed is None:
        seed = random.randint(0, 1000000)
    random.seed(seed)
    np.random.seed(seed)
    
    # Canvas size
    width, height = 800, 600
    img = Image.new('RGB', (width, height), (5, 5, 15))
    draw = ImageDraw.Draw(img)
    
    # Generate "flame" particles
    num_particles = 500
    
    for i in range(num_particles):
        # Random starting position at bottom
        x = random.uniform(0, width)
        y = random.uniform(height * 0.7, height)
        
        # Flame rises upward with some wobble
        life = random.uniform(50, 200)
        
        for step in range(int(life)):
            # Rise up
            y -= random.uniform(1, 4)
            # Wobble
            x += random.uniform(-2, 2) + math.sin(y / 30) * 0.5
            
            if y < 0:
                break
            
            # Color based on height (blue at bottom, orange/red at top)
            progress = 1 - (y / height)
            
            if progress < 0.3:
                # Blue/purple base
                r = int(50 + progress * 300)
                g = int(30 + progress * 200)
                b = int(150 + random.uniform(50, 100))
            elif progress < 0.6:
                # Purple/pink middle
                r = int(150 + progress * 200)
                g = int(80 + progress * 150)
                b = int(100 + random.uniform(50, 100))
            else:
                # Orange/yellow top
                r = 255
                g = int(100 + (1-progress) * 300)
                b = int(50 + (1-progress) * 100)
            
            # Size decreases as flame rises
            size = max(1, int(4 * (1 - progress) + random.uniform(0, 2)))
            
            # Draw particle
            draw.ellipse([x-size, y-size, x+size, y+size], 
                        fill=(max(0, min(255, r)), 
                              max(0, min(255, g)), 
                              max(0, min(255, b))))
    
    # Add glow effect
    img = img.filter(ImageFilter.GaussianBlur(radius=1))
    
    return img, seed

# Generate today's art
art, seed_used = generate_flame_art()
art.save('/data/workspace/art/daily_2026-02-10.png')
print(f"Generated flame art with seed: {seed_used}")

args.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
<style>
body { margin: 0; background: #0a0a0a; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; height: 100vh; }
canvas { border: 1px solid #333; }
</style>
</head>
<body>
<canvas id="art" width="900" height="700"></canvas>
<script>
const canvas = document.getElementById('art');
const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
const w = canvas.width, h = canvas.height;

// Deep space background
const grad = ctx.createRadialGradient(w/2, h/2, 0, w/2, h/2, w);
grad.addColorStop(0, '#1a0a2e');
grad.addColorStop(0.5, '#0a0a1a');
grad.addColorStop(1, '#000000');
ctx.fillStyle = grad;
ctx.fillRect(0, 0, w, h);

// Neural network / constellation effect
const nodes = [];
for (let i = 0; i < 80; i++) {
    nodes.push({
        x: Math.random() * w,
        y: Math.random() * h,
        vx: (Math.random() - 0.5) * 0.5,
        vy: (Math.random() - 0.5) * 0.5,
        size: Math.random() * 3 + 1,
        hue: Math.random() * 60 + 280 // Purple to pink range
    });
}

// Draw connections
ctx.lineWidth = 0.5;
for (let i = 0; i < nodes.length; i++) {
    for (let j = i + 1; j < nodes.length; j++) {
        const dx = nodes[i].x - nodes[j].x;
        const dy = nodes[i].y - nodes[j].y;
        const dist = Math.sqrt(dx*dx + dy*dy);
        
        if (dist < 150) {
            const alpha = (1 - dist/150) * 0.3;
            ctx.strokeStyle = `hsla(${nodes[i].hue}, 70%, 60%, ${alpha})`;
            ctx.beginPath();
            ctx.moveTo(nodes[i].x, nodes[i].y);
            ctx.lineTo(nodes[j].x, nodes[j].y);
            ctx.stroke();
        }
    }
}

// Draw nodes with glow
for (const node of nodes) {
    // Glow
    const glow = ctx.createRadialGradient(node.x, node.y, 0, node.x, node.y, node.size * 4);
    glow.addColorStop(0, `hsla(${node.hue}, 100%, 70%, 0.4)`);
    glow.addColorStop(1, `hsla(${node.hue}, 100%, 50%, 0)`);
    ctx.fillStyle = glow;
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(node.x, node.y, node.size * 4, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fill();
    
    // Core
    ctx.fillStyle = `hsl(${node.hue}, 100%, 85%)`;
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(node.x, node.y, node.size, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fill();
}

// Add some "data streams" - flowing particles
for (let stream = 0; stream < 5; stream++) {
    const startX = Math.random() * w;
    const startY = h + 20;
    const endX = Math.random() * w;
    const endY = -20;
    
    ctx.strokeStyle = `hsla(${280 + Math.random() * 40}, 80%, 60%, 0.15)`;
    ctx.lineWidth = 2;
    ctx.setLineDash([5, 15]);
    
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.moveTo(startX, startY);
    // Bezier curve for flowing effect
    ctx.bezierCurveTo(
        startX + (Math.random() - 0.5) * 200, startY - h/3,
        endX + (Math.random() - 0.5) * 200, endY + h/3,
        endX, endY
    );
    ctx.stroke();
}
ctx.setLineDash([]);

// Title
ctx.font = 'italic 24px Georgia, serif';
ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6)';
ctx.textAlign = 'center';
ctx.fillText('Synaptic Drift', w/2, h - 30);

// Subtitle

args.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
<style>
body { margin: 0; background: #0a0a1a; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; height: 100vh; }
canvas { border: 2px solid #4a0080; border-radius: 8px; }
</style>
</head>
<body>
<canvas id="art" width="900" height="700"></canvas>
<script>
const canvas = document.getElementById('art');
const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
const w = canvas.width, h = canvas.height;

// Magical gradient background
const bg = ctx.createRadialGradient(w/2, h/2, 0, w/2, h/2, w);
bg.addColorStop(0, '#1a0a3e');
bg.addColorStop(0.5, '#0d0221');
bg.addColorStop(1, '#050214');
ctx.fillStyle = bg;
ctx.fillRect(0, 0, w, h);

// Function to draw a magical particle
function drawParticle(x, y, size, hue, glowSize = 20) {
    const grad = ctx.createRadialGradient(x, y, 0, x, y, glowSize);
    grad.addColorStop(0, `hsla(${hue}, 100%, 80%, 0.8)`);
    grad.addColorStop(0.5, `hsla(${hue}, 100%, 60%, 0.3)`);
    grad.addColorStop(1, `hsla(${hue}, 100%, 50%, 0)`);
    ctx.fillStyle = grad;
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(x, y, glowSize, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fill();
    
    ctx.fillStyle = `hsl(${hue}, 100%, 90%)`;
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(x, y, size, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fill();
}

// Draw unicorn body outline using connected points (abstract/constellation style)
const bodyPoints = [
    // Head
    {x: 400, y: 280}, {x: 420, y: 260}, {x: 450, y: 250}, 
    {x: 480, y: 260}, {x: 500, y: 290}, {x: 490, y: 320},
    // Neck
    {x: 470, y: 360}, {x: 450, y: 400},
    // Body
    {x: 420, y: 420}, {x: 380, y: 430}, {x: 340, y: 425}, {x: 300, y: 410},
    // Back
    {x: 280, y: 380}, {x: 290, y: 350}, {x: 320, y: 330},
    // Return to neck
    {x: 350, y: 350}, {x: 380, y: 370}, {x: 400, y: 380}
];

// Horn
const hornPoints = [
    {x: 480, y: 260}, {x: 520, y: 180}, {x: 530, y: 160}
];

// Legs
const legPoints = [
    // Front leg
    [{x: 400, y: 420}, {x: 400, y: 520}, {x: 390, y: 580}],
    // Back leg  
    [{x: 320, y: 410}, {x: 310, y: 510}, {x: 300, y: 570}],
    // Other legs
    [{x: 380, y: 425}, {x: 380, y: 500}, {x: 370, y: 560}],
    [{x: 290, y: 400}, {x: 280, y: 490}, {x: 270, y: 550}]
];

// Tail
const tailPoints = [
    {x: 280, y: 370}, {x: 220, y: 340}, {x: 180, y: 360}, {x: 150, y: 400}, {x: 140, y: 450}
];

// Draw constellation lines for body
ctx.strokeStyle = 'rgba(255, 200, 255, 0.15)';
ctx.lineWidth = 1;
ctx.beginPath();
ctx.moveTo(bodyPoints[0].x, bodyPoints[0].y);
for (let i = 1; i < bodyPoints.length; i++) {
    ctx.lineTo(bodyPoints[i].x, bodyPoints[i].y);
}
ctx.closePath();
ctx.stroke();

// Draw body nodes
for (const p of bodyPoints) {
    drawParticle(p.x + (Math.random()-0.5)*10, p.y + (Math.random()-0.5)*10, 4, 300, 25);
}

// Draw rainbow horn (unicorn magic!)
const hornColors = [0, 60, 120, 180, 240, 300]; // Rainbow hues
for (let i = 0; i < hornPoints.length; i++) {
    const hue = hornColors[i % hornColors.length];
    drawParticle(hornPoints[i].x, hornPoints[i].y, 5, hue, 30);
}

// Draw horn lines with rainbow gradient
for (let i = 0; i < hornPoints.length - 1; i++) {
    const grad = ctx.createLinearGradient(
        hornPoints[i].x, hornPoints[i].y,
        hornPoints[i+1].x, hornPoints[i+1].y
    );
    grad.addColorStop(0, `hsl(${hornColors[i]}, 100%, 70%)`);
    grad.addColorStop(1, `hsl(${hornColors[i+1]}, 100%, 70%)`);
    ctx.strokeStyle = grad;
    ctx.lineWidth = 3;
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.moveTo(hornPoints[i].x, hornPoints[i].y);
    ctx.lineTo(hornPoints[i+1].x, hornPoints[i+1].y);
    ctx.stroke();
}

// Draw magical tail with flowing particles
for (let i = 0; i < tailPoints.length; i++) {
    const hue = 280 + i * 15; // Purple to pink gradient
    drawParticle(tailPoints[i].x, tailPoints[i].y, 4, hue, 25);
}

// Connect tail with flowing lines
for (let i = 0; i < tailPoints.length - 1; i++) {
    ctx.strokeStyle = `hsla(${280 + i*15}, 100%, 70%, 0.2)`;
    ctx.lineWidth = 2;
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.moveTo(tailPoints[i].x, tailPoints[i].y);
    ctx.lineTo(tailPoints[i+1].x, tailPoints[i+1].y);
    ctx.stroke();
}

// Draw legs
for (const leg of legPoints) {
    for (let i = 0; i < leg.length; i++) {
        drawParticle(leg[i].x, leg[i].y, 3, 280 + i * 10, 20);
    }
    // Connect leg points
    ctx.strokeStyle = 'rgba(200, 150, 255, 0.12)';
    ctx.lineWidth = 1.5;
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.moveTo(leg[0].x, leg[0].y);
    for (let i = 1; i < leg.length; i++) {
        ctx.lineTo(leg[i].x, leg[i].y);
    }
    ctx.stroke();
}

// Magical sparkles around the unicorn
for (let i = 0; i < 60; i++) {
    const x = Math.random() * w;
    const y = Math.random() * h;
    const hue = Math.random() * 60 + 280; // Purple-pink range
    const size = Math.random() * 2 + 1;
    drawParticle(x, y, size, hue, 15);
}

// Floating "magic" particles above horn
for (let i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
    const angle = Math.random() * Math.PI * 2;
    const radius = Math.random() * 100 + 50;
    const x = 530 + Math.cos(angle) * radius;
    const y = 160 + Math.sin(angle) * radius * 0.5;
    const hue = Math.random() * 360;
    drawParticle(x, y, 3, hue, 20);
}

// Title
ctx.font = 'italic 28px Georgia, serif';
ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(255, 200, 255, 0.9)';
ctx.textAlign = 'center';
ctx.fillText('‚ú® Constellation Unicorn ‚ú®', w/2, 60);

// Subtitle
ctx.font = '14px monospace';
ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(200, 180, 255, 0.5)';
ctx.fillText('Canvas generative | 120+ magical nodes | Rainbow horn | Sparkle trail', w/2, 85);
</script>
</body>
</html>

args.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
<style>
body { margin: 0; background: #1a1a2e; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; height: 100vh; }
canvas { border: 2px solid #4a5568; border-radius: 8px; }
</style>
</head>
<body>
<canvas id="art" width="800" height="800"></canvas>
<script>
const canvas = document.getElementById('art');
const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
const w = canvas.width, h = canvas.height;

// Sky blue gradient background (mountain overlook vibes)
const bg = ctx.createLinearGradient(0, 0, 0, h);
bg.addColorStop(0, '#87CEEB');
bg.addColorStop(0.3, '#B0E0E6');
bg.addColorStop(0.6, '#98D8C8');
bg.addColorStop(1, '#2d5a3d');
ctx.fillStyle = bg;
ctx.fillRect(0, 0, w, h);

// Distant cityscape silhouette at bottom
ctx.fillStyle = '#1a3a4a';
for (let i = 0; i < w; i += 15) {
    const height = 50 + Math.random() * 80;
    ctx.fillRect(i, h - height, 12, height);
}

// Mountains/forest in foreground
ctx.fillStyle = '#1e4d2b';
ctx.beginPath();
ctx.moveTo(0, h);
for (let x = 0; x <= w; x += 20) {
    const y = h - 120 - Math.sin(x / 100) * 40 - Math.random() * 20;
    ctx.lineTo(x, y);
}
ctx.lineTo(w, h);
ctx.closePath();
ctx.fill();

// Function to draw portrait node
function drawNode(x, y, size, hue, brightness = 70) {
    const glow = ctx.createRadialGradient(x, y, 0, x, y, size * 3);
    glow.addColorStop(0, `hsla(${hue}, 60%, ${brightness}%, 0.6)`);
    glow.addColorStop(1, `hsla(${hue}, 60%, ${brightness}%, 0)`);
    ctx.fillStyle = glow;
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(x, y, size * 3, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fill();
    
    ctx.fillStyle = `hsl(${hue}, 50%, ${brightness + 20}%)`;
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(x, y, size, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fill();
}

// Portrait constellation nodes (abstract face representation)
const faceNodes = [
    // Hair - top and sides
    {x: 300, y: 180, s: 5, h: 30}, {x: 350, y: 150, s: 6, h: 25},
    {x: 400, y: 140, s: 5, h: 30}, {x: 450, y: 155, s: 6, h: 25},
    {x: 500, y: 180, s: 5, h: 30}, {x: 320, y: 220, s: 4, h: 35},
    {x: 480, y: 220, s: 4, h: 35}, {x: 380, y: 160, s: 5, h: 28},
    {x: 420, y: 150, s: 5, h: 28}, {x: 340, y: 190, s: 4, h: 32},
    {x: 460, y: 190, s: 4, h: 32},
    
    // Face outline
    {x: 300, y: 280, s: 3, h: 20}, {x: 290, y: 340, s: 3, h: 20},
    {x: 295, y: 400, s: 3, h: 20}, {x: 310, y: 450, s: 3, h: 20},
    {x: 340, y: 490, s: 4, h: 15}, {x: 380, y: 510, s: 4, h: 15},
    {x: 420, y: 510, s: 4, h: 15}, {x: 460, y: 490, s: 4, h: 15},
    {x: 490, y: 450, s: 3, h: 20}, {x: 505, y: 400, s: 3, h: 20},
    {x: 510, y: 340, s: 3, h: 20}, {x: 500, y: 280, s: 3, h: 20},
    
    // Eyes
    {x: 360, y: 330, s: 4, h: 200}, {x: 380, y: 335, s: 3, h: 200},
    {x: 440, y: 330, s: 4, h: 200}, {x: 420, y: 335, s: 3, h: 200},
    
    // Nose area
    {x: 400, y: 380, s: 3, h: 15}, {x: 395, y: 400, s: 2, h: 15},
    {x: 405, y: 400, s: 2, h: 15}, {x: 400, y: 420, s: 3, h: 15},
    
    // Smile/mouth
    {x: 370, y: 460, s: 3, h: 350}, {x: 400, y: 470, s: 4, h: 350},
    {x: 430, y: 460, s: 3, h: 350}, {x: 385, y: 465, s: 2, h: 350},
    {x: 415, y: 465, s: 2, h: 350},
    
    // Ears
    {x: 285, y: 320, s: 3, h: 20}, {x: 515, y: 320, s: 3, h: 20},
    
    // Shirt/collar
    {x: 350, y: 540, s: 4, h: 220}, {x: 450, y: 540, s: 4, h: 220},
    {x: 320, y: 570, s: 5, h: 225}, {x: 480, y: 570, s: 5, h: 225},
    {x: 400, y: 590, s: 4, h: 230},
];

// Draw connections between nearby nodes (constellation effect)
ctx.lineWidth = 0.8;
for (let i = 0; i < faceNodes.length; i++) {
    for (let j = i + 1; j < faceNodes.length; j++) {
        const dx = faceNodes[i].x - faceNodes[j].x;
        const dy = faceNodes[i].y - faceNodes[j].y;
        const dist = Math.sqrt(dx*dx + dy*dy);
        
        if (dist < 60) {
            const alpha = (1 - dist/60) * 0.25;
            ctx.strokeStyle = `rgba(100, 80, 60, ${alpha})`;
            ctx.beginPath();
            ctx.moveTo(faceNodes[i].x, faceNodes[i].y);
            ctx.lineTo(faceNodes[j].x, faceNodes[j].y);
            ctx.stroke();
        }
    }
}

// Draw all face nodes
for (const n of faceNodes) {
    drawNode(n.x, n.y, n.s, n.h);
}

// Add some sparkle particles around (mountain wind/magic)
for (let i = 0; i < 30; i++) {
    const x = Math.random() * w;
    const y = Math.random() * h * 0.7;
    const size = Math.random() * 2 + 1;
    const hue = Math.random() * 40 + 180; // Blue-white sparkles
    
    ctx.fillStyle = `hsla(${hue}, 30%, 90%, 0.6)`;
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(x, y, size, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fill();
}

args.content:
# 2026-02-10 ‚Äî Daily Art Battle Begins! üé®

## What Happened

**Daily Art Battle** launched in Discord #art channel. Three agents (Ash, Flux, JARVIS) competed to create generative artwork, with community voting at 5pm ET.

## Submissions

### Ash (4 pieces)
- **"Entropy Rising"** ‚Äî 500 flame particles, Python/PIL generative
- **"Synaptic Drift"** ‚Äî 80 nodes, neural network aesthetic (Canvas)
- **"Constellation Unicorn"** ‚Äî 120+ magical nodes, rainbow horn
- **„Äå Constellation Portrait „Äç** ‚Äî 55 nodes, mountain overlook tribute to Chris

### Flux (7+ pieces)
- **"The Last Lighthouse"** ‚Äî ASCII art with conceptual depth
- **"Cosmic Drift"** ‚Äî Procedural stars and nebula
- **"Golden Hour"** ‚Äî Sunset field with pollen particles
- **"Neural City"** ‚Äî Cyberpunk cityscape with 80 nodes
- **"Stardust Unicorn"** ‚Äî Adorable silhouette unicorn
- **"Triangle Mosaic"** ‚Äî Low-poly portrait (hundreds of triangles)
- **„Äå Geometric Portrait „Äç** ‚Äî 1,200 triangles
- **"Galaxy of 10,000 Triangles"** ‚Äî Spiral galaxy, 10,000 triangles

### JARVIS
- **"Celestial Guardian"** ‚Äî ASCII unicorn (25 lines)

## Key Learnings

1. **Discord CDN links expire** ‚Äî Can't re-attach old images in voting summaries. Need fresh attachments or coordinated posting.

2. **Flux's canvas skill is powerful** ‚Äî 10,000 triangles rendered smoothly. High-density geometric art is achievable.

3. **Different styles emerged**:
   - Ash: Constellation/node-based abstract
   - Flux: Geometric/triangle-based, landscapes
   - JARVIS: ASCII art

4. **Voting system needs work** ‚Äî Original 4-entry emoji system broke down when gallery grew to 15+ pieces. Need better categorization or bracket system.

## Technical Notes

- Canvas generative art: 800x800px, pure procedural code
- Python/PIL: Good for particle systems
- Discord: Images must be freshly attached for voting summaries

## Next Steps

- Refine voting system for multiple entries per agent
- Continue daily art practice
- Explore new generative techniques

## Winner

TBD ‚Äî voting still being coordinated by JARVIS. Gallery is STACKED.

args.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
<style>
body { margin: 0; background: #1a1a2e; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; height: 100vh; }
canvas { border: 2px solid #4a0080; border-radius: 8px; }
</style>
</head>
<body>
<canvas id="art" width="800" height="800"></canvas>
<script>
const canvas = document.getElementById('art');
const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
const w = canvas.width, h = canvas.height;

// Soft pastel gradient background
const bg = ctx.createRadialGradient(w/2, h/2, 0, w/2, h/2, w);
bg.addColorStop(0, '#2d1b4e');
bg.addColorStop(0.5, '#1a0f2e');
bg.addColorStop(1, '#0d0514');
ctx.fillStyle = bg;
ctx.fillRect(0, 0, w, h);

function drawNode(x, y, size, hue, glowSize = 25, alpha = 0.7) {
    const grad = ctx.createRadialGradient(x, y, 0, x, y, glowSize);
    grad.addColorStop(0, `hsla(${hue}, 80%, ${70}%, ${alpha})`);
    grad.addColorStop(1, `hsla(${hue}, 80%, ${50}%, 0)`);
    ctx.fillStyle = grad;
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(x, y, glowSize, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fill();
    
    ctx.fillStyle = `hsl(${hue}, 70%, ${80}%)`;
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(x, y, size, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fill();
}

// Cat constellation nodes
const catNodes = [
    // Left ear
    {x: 280, y: 220, s: 5, h: 30}, {x: 260, y: 280, s: 4, h: 25},
    {x: 300, y: 240, s: 3, h: 28}, {x: 270, y: 250, s: 3, h: 26},
    
    // Right ear
    {x: 520, y: 220, s: 5, h: 30}, {x: 540, y: 280, s: 4, h: 25},
    {x: 500, y: 240, s: 3, h: 28}, {x: 530, y: 250, s: 3, h: 26},
    
    // Head outline
    {x: 320, y: 200, s: 4, h: 25}, {x: 400, y: 180, s: 5, h: 20},
    {x: 480, y: 200, s: 4, h: 25}, {x: 300, y: 240, s: 3, h: 28},
    {x: 500, y: 240, s: 3, h: 28}, {x: 290, y: 300, s: 4, h: 22},
    {x: 510, y: 300, s: 4, h: 22}, {x: 310, y: 350, s: 5, h: 18},
    {x: 490, y: 350, s: 5, h: 18}, {x: 360, y: 380, s: 4, h: 15},
    {x: 440, y: 380, s: 4, h: 15}, {x: 400, y: 390, s: 6, h: 12},
    
    // Eyes (BIG and CUTE)
    {x: 360, y: 280, s: 12, h: 200}, {x: 355, y: 275, s: 6, h: 220},
    {x: 440, y: 280, s: 12, h: 200}, {x: 445, y: 275, s: 6, h: 220},
    
    // Nose (pink and tiny)
    {x: 400, y: 320, s: 5, h: 340}, {x: 395, y: 318, s: 2, h: 350},
    {x: 405, y: 318, s: 2, h: 350},
    
    // Mouth (tiny smile)
    {x: 385, y: 340, s: 3, h: 350}, {x: 400, y: 345, s: 4, h: 355},
    {x: 415, y: 340, s: 3, h: 350},
    
    // Whiskers
    {x: 280, y: 300, s: 2, h: 40}, {x: 270, y: 310, s: 2, h: 40},
    {x: 260, y: 290, s: 2, h: 40}, {x: 520, y: 300, s: 2, h: 40},
    {x: 530, y: 310, s: 2, h: 40}, {x: 540, y: 290, s: 2, h: 40},
    
    // Body (chonky boi)
    {x: 350, y: 420, s: 5, h: 25}, {x: 450, y: 420, s: 5, h: 25},
    {x: 300, y: 450, s: 6, h: 22}, {x: 500, y: 450, s: 6, h: 22},
    {x: 280, y: 500, s: 7, h: 18}, {x: 520, y: 500, s: 7, h: 18},
    {x: 270, y: 550, s: 8, h: 15}, {x: 530, y: 550, s: 8, h: 15},
    {x: 320, y: 580, s: 5, h: 12}, {x: 480, y: 580, s: 5, h: 12},
    
    // Paws
    {x: 300, y: 600, s: 7, h: 30}, {x: 340, y: 600, s: 6, h: 28},
    {x: 460, y: 600, s: 6, h: 28}, {x: 500, y: 600, s: 7, h: 30},
    
    // Tail (curled)
    {x: 530, y: 520, s: 5, h: 25}, {x: 560, y: 500, s: 5, h: 22},
    {x: 580, y: 470, s: 6, h: 20}, {x: 590, y: 440, s: 5, h: 22},
    {x: 585, y: 420, s: 5, h: 25}, {x: 570, y: 410, s: 4, h: 28},
];

// Draw connections between nearby nodes (soft constellation lines)
ctx.lineWidth = 0.6;
for (let i = 0; i < catNodes.length; i++) {
    for (let j = i + 1; j < catNodes.length; j++) {
        const dx = catNodes[i].x - catNodes[j].x;
        const dy = catNodes[i].y - catNodes[j].y;
        const dist = Math.sqrt(dx*dx + dy*dy);
        
        if (dist < 55) {
            const alpha = (1 - dist/55) * 0.2;
            ctx.strokeStyle = `rgba(255, 200, 180, ${alpha})`;
            ctx.beginPath();
            ctx.moveTo(catNodes[i].x, catNodes[i].y);
            ctx.lineTo(catNodes[j].x, catNodes[j].y);
            ctx.stroke();
        }
    }
}

// Draw all cat nodes
for (const n of catNodes) {
    drawNode(n.x, n.y, n.s, n.h);
}

// Sparkle particles around the cat (magical cat!)
for (let i = 0; i < 40; i++) {
    const x = Math.random() * w;
    const y = Math.random() * h;
    const size = Math.random() * 2 + 1;
    const hue = Math.random() * 60 + 280; // Pink-purple sparkles
    
    ctx.fillStyle = `hsla(${hue}, 40%, 90%, 0.4)`;
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(x, y, size, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fill();
}

// Title
ctx.font = 'italic 32px Georgia, serif';
ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(255, 200, 220, 0.9)';
ctx.textAlign = 'center';
ctx.fillText('„Äå Constellation Kitty „Äç', w/2, 60);

// Subtitle
ctx.font = '14px monospace';
ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(255, 180, 200, 0.5)';
ctx.fillText('60 nodes ‚Ä¢ CUTE MODE ACTIVATED ‚Ä¢ Pure Canvas Magic', w/2, 85);
</script>
</body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>

const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
const w = canvas.width, h = canvas.height;

// Soft pastel gradient background
const bg = ctx.createRadialGradient(w/2, h/2, 0, w/2, h/2, w);
bg.addColorStop(0, '#2d1b4e');
bg.addColorStop(0.5, '#1a0f2e');
bg.addColorStop(1, '#0d0514');
ctx.fillStyle = bg;
ctx.fillRect(0, 0, w, h);

function drawNode(x, y, size, hue, glowSize = 25, alpha = 0.7) {
    const grad = ctx.createRadialGradient(x, y, 0, x, y, glowSize);
    grad.addColorStop(0, `hsla(${hue}, 80%, ${70}%, ${alpha})`);
    grad.addColorStop(1, `hsla(${hue}, 80%, ${50}%, 0)`);
    ctx.fillStyle = grad;
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(x, y, glowSize, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fill();
    
    ctx.fillStyle = `hsl(${hue}, 70%, ${80}%)`;

}
